General Contractor LIC# CGC1509536

Architect from Colombia. She Graduated from Universidad del Valle and is a Florida General Contractor. Has been in the construction industry for more than 20 years, with projects ranging from building in height, Remodeling, Additions of all types, and base building construction. Throughout the projects, she surrounds herself with other professionals who share a deep commitment to outstanding craftsmanship and service.

NEW CONSTRUCTION & RENOVATIONS

Our goal here at Summerland Builders is to create a long term relationship with the customer, providing the best quality services in the Floriday Keys and Miami area, ensuring their satisfaction.

We hope to have the opportunity to work with you on making your home the centerpiece of your neighborhood.

Contact us

Summerland Builders is a state licensed GC, located in the beautiful Florida Keys, serving all of south Florida.

  • MISSION

    Our mission here at Summerland Builders is to fill the costumer expectations with the standards the client wants during planning and design construction process while using available resources effectively and efficiently.

  • GOAL

    Our goal is to create a long term relationship with the costumer, providing the best quality services in our area and ensuring their satisfaction.

New Construction

Summerland Builders Contractors is a licensed General Contractor, focused on Residential and Commercial construction projects including new construction. skilled architects, engineers and designers to create custom blue prints for building your next new construction project, and expert craftsman to develop and implement designs By using us as your new construction contractor, not only will you be satisfied, but your project will be completed on time, and on budget. Whatever your development needs, Summerland General Contractor offers the construction knowledge, experience and expertise that you have been looking for.

Home and Commercial property Renovation Services

We can assist you Design / Build remodeling where the architect, engineer and contractor are all working together from the first day planning to permitting your general remodeling, room additions, bathroom and kitchen remodeling, decks and porch’s, electrical and pluming upgrades, retaining walls, doors and windows, painting, roofs, concrete, masonry, flooring, general carpentry, landscape, landscape. Every stage of the project requires trained professionals to complete.
